rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective. 'really high alert' describes a state.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.

rationale: 'on really high alert' is an intensified critical alert phrase.
statement_text: “The industry is definitely on really high alert,” said veterinarian Denise Heard with the U.S. Poultry & Egg Association trade group.
